titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on the Judiciary.

calendar.text: Committee on the Judiciary ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on the Judiciary. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Specter. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary: 2/3/2005--Reported to Senate without amendment. Authorizes expenditures by the Committee on the Judiciary for the 109th Congress.
